bach.SeriesAbstractDateTime¶

class bach.SeriesAbstractDateTime(engine, base_node, index, name, expression, group_by, sorted_ascending=None)[source]¶

A Series that represents the generic date/time type and its specific operations. Selected arithmetic operations are accepted using the usual operators.

Date/Time Operations

On any of the subtypes, you can access date operations through the dt accessor.

Attributes

dt

Get access to date operations.
